rules.natural: If the greenhouse is open, then the garden is operational.
Provided that funding for conservation is approved, a grant for conservation is received.
Whenever funding for conservation is approved, it is not the case that a grant for conservation is received.

Either funding for conservation is approved, or there is a special orchid‑show event, or, if it is not true that whenever a botanist guide is available a tour is scheduled for the tour group, then the tour group is self‑guided.
Under the condition that a fundraising campaign is launched by the garden, the garden is not in a financial crisis.
If the garden holds a donation drive, then a fundraising campaign is launched by the garden.
A foundation acts as a private sponsor or the garden holds a donation drive.
Provided that a community volunteer day takes place, the garden is operational.
Whenever a school visit by students occurs, the garden is operational.
A press release is issued for publicity or the garden posts on social media.
Provided that the garden posts on social media, then either a member event for the society is held, or a community volunteer day takes place, or a school visit by students occurs.
Either the garden has high attendance or it is not the case that the garden has low attendance.
A new plant species is acquired or a seed exchange with a partner occurs.
Provided that a seed exchange with a partner occurs, the garden is operational.
Whenever the conservatory collection is expanded, the garden is operational.
If legal clearance is obtained, then, should it not be true that whenever a new plant species is acquired the conservatory collection is expanded, the acquisition of a new species does not fail.

If there is local‑news media coverage, then, if a press release is issued for publicity, either a member event for the society is held, or a community volunteer day takes place, or a school visit by students occurs.
Either there is local‑news media coverage or there is national‑news media coverage.

If a feature article appears in a magazine, then, should there be national‑news media coverage, then, if a press release is issued for publicity, either a member event for the society is held, or a community volunteer day takes place, or a school visit by students occurs.
A feature article appears in a magazine or a TV segment is aired as part of a documentary.
Whenever an ethics investigation is opened, there is no public opposition to the acquisition.
A board meeting is scheduled or an emergency meeting is called.

If an emergency meeting is called, then, should a press release be issued for publicity, either a member event for the society is held, or a community volunteer day takes place, or a school visit by students occurs.

Under the condition that a decision is made by the board, then, if a press release is issued for publicity, either a member event for the society is held, or a community volunteer day takes place, or a school visit by students occurs.
The acquisition policy is reviewed, or, if a board meeting is scheduled, a decision is made by the board.
The irrigation system is repaired, or the irrigation system is not damaged.
If a tour is scheduled for the tour group, then, under the condition that a tour group is admitted to visit, the garden is operational.

If it is not the case that if a press release is issued for publicity then either a member event for the society is held, or a community volunteer day takes place, or a school visit by students occurs, then the garden has low attendance.
Should it not be true that whenever staff perform maintenance on the greenhouse the greenhouse is open, then the irrigation system is damaged.
If it is not the case that whenever a new plant species is acquired the conservatory collection is expanded, then the acquisition of a new species fails.

If it is not true that either there is publicity controversy over the acquisition, or, if a TV segment is aired as part of a documentary, then, if there is national‑news media coverage, then, if a press release is issued for publicity, either a member event for the society is held, or a community volunteer day takes place, or a school visit by students occurs, then it is not the case that there is public support for the acquisition.
Provided that it is not true that either the acquisition policy is updated or the acquisition policy is not reviewed, then compliance is not verified by an auditor.
Whenever it is not true that if a botanist guide is available a tour is scheduled for the tour group, then the tour group is not self‑guided.

If it is not the case that if it is not true that either there is publicity controversy over the acquisition, or, if a TV segment is aired as part of a documentary, then, if there is national‑news media coverage, then, if a press release is issued for publicity, either a member event for the society is held, or a community volunteer day takes place, or a school visit by students occurs, then there is public support for the acquisition, then there is public opposition to the acquisition.

Under the condition that it is not true that if it is not the case that either there is publicity controversy over the acquisition, or, if a TV segment is aired as part of a documentary, then, if there is national‑news media coverage, then, if a press release is issued for publicity, either a member event for the society is held, or a community volunteer day takes place, or a school visit by students occurs, then there is public support for the acquisition, then an ethics investigation is opened.

If it is not true that if it is not the case that either the acquisition policy is updated or the acquisition policy is not reviewed then compliance is verified by an auditor, then the acquisition passes an audit.

Whenever it is not the case that if it is not true that either the acquisition policy is updated or the acquisition policy is not reviewed then compliance is verified by an auditor, the acquisition does not pass an audit.
Should the garden not be operational, then the garden is in a financial crisis.
